title: Fake Return Scams: Secure Your Crypto Investments
description:
I had received a message on Twitter about a free airdrop for Sivici. I was dumb enough to click it even though I know better because this coin is going wild.Please help me get my funds back or if I have an ability to move the remaining funds that’s I have in this wallet. SOS
